hero.subtitle: BetaX Technologies delivers cutting-edge smart agriculture, IoT solutions, and sustainable energy systems that transform challenges into opportunities across Nigeria and beyond.

about.title: About BetaX
about.content:
At BetaX Technologies, we believe in bridging the gap between advanced technology and practical, everyday use. Our mission is to make modern technology affordable, reliable, and accessible across Nigeria.

We specialize in:
- Smart Agriculture Solutions
- Sustainable Energy Systems
- IoT-powered Smart Home Technology

Founded with a vision to transform how Nigerians interact with technology, we're committed to delivering solutions that work in real-world conditions.
